name: CPC Invaders (Refurbished)
description:
CPC Invaders is a Galaxians/Invaders style arcade game, programmed 100% in Locomotive Basic for the Amstrad CPC retro computers. This was my first participation to the CPCRetroDev, year 2020.

This version is 'refurbished' from the original presented to the contest, correcting lot of bugs and improved playability.

HISTORY

They come to the earth to get all our Amstrad CPC computers, otherwise if we not delivered to them, they can destroy the planet!

CONTROLS

Redefineable keys and compatible joystick.
The default assigned keys are:

CURSOR LEFT
MOVE TO LEFTCURSOR RIGHT
MOVE TO RIGHTSPACE BAR
ACTION'P' KEY
PAUSE GAME GAME DESIGN

Program, game graphics and music: Francesc Alcaucer
